definition: to inspect/to review/to read/to peruse/to go through/to experience

sentences.english: People will pay for access to those in a way they won't for the latest episode of House or a reality show.
sentences.chinese: 人們付費來閱覽的並非是一段議會的插曲或現實秀。

sentences.english: It is required that nobody (should) smoke in the reading-room.
sentences.chinese: 按要求，誰都不許在閱覽室吸菸。

sentences.english: You ought not to have taken the book out of the reading-room.
sentences.chinese: 你不應該把書帶出閱覽室。

sentences.english: He reentered the reading room by another door.
sentences.chinese: 他從另一個門又進入閱覽室。

sentences.english: The building being repaired is our reading-room .
sentences.chinese: 現在維修的那棟樓是我們的閱覽室。

sentences.english: The reading room closes at 10 p.m .
I learned a lesson in the reading-room that I will remember all my life.
sentences.chinese: 我在閱覽室裏學到一個終生難忘的教訓。

sentences.english: Our classroom is used as a reading-room.
sentences.chinese: 躚我們的教室被用來當閱覽室使用。

sentences.english: They transformed the basement into a reading room.
sentences.chinese: 他們把地下室改建成閱覽室。

sentences.english: Only teachers of this school can use the on-line reading-room.
sentences.chinese: 只有本校教師纔可以用收集閱覽室。

sentences.english: Soon our comic-book library was open to the public.
sentences.chinese: 很快我們的小人書閱覽室就對外開放了。

sentences.english: Everybody in the reading-room looked up from their books at me unfriendly.
sentences.chinese: 閱覽室裏所有的人都擡起頭，異樣地看着我。

sentences.english: This reading-room is only used by teachers.
sentences.chinese: 這間閱覽室只供教師使用。

sentences.english: Indexes are available for people who want to see if a document exists in the archives.
sentences.chinese: 檔案室爲那些有意閱覽者提供目錄索引。

sentences.english: He has been in the reading-room since after lunch.
sentences.chinese: 午飯後他一直呆在閱覽室裏。

sentences.english: Reading room for teachers and students.
sentences.chinese: “乳源教師進修學校”師生閱覽室。

definition: lit. looking for a fine horse using only a picture (idiom)/fig. to do things along rigid, conventional lines/to try and find sth with the help of a clue
to consult/to refer to/to look sth up in a reference source
